name: recreationist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who enjoys outdoor activities, such as hiking and camping in the countryside: The typical avalanche victim is a recreationist, very skilled at their sport but with poor avalanche awareness skills. He's a self-described recreationist who does summer hiking trips in wolf country.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was an enthusiastic outdoorsman and recreationist. More than half the fires are caused by recreationists discarding cigarettes or having campfires.More than 50 percent of the population consider themselves to be outdoor recreationists. She is an artist, writer, conservationist, and an avid recreationist.
